Kindly update on the TPL & PAR renewals and please take into consideration the below requests from The Avenues management.

DINA AL WAZZAN

Cc: Rana Mohammed Ayoub <ayoub@mabanee.com>; Rakan Husam AlKarmi <r.alkarmi@mabanee.com>
Subject: Renewal of Insurance Policies

From: Mohamad Serhan <m.serhan@mabanee.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, September 3, 2025 2:29 PM
To: Dina Al Wazzan <Dina.Alwazzan@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Rana Mohammed Ayoub <ayoub@mabanee.com>; Rakan Husam AlKarmi <r.alkarmi@mabanee.com>
Subject: Renewal of Insurance Policies

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Dina,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I would like to bring to your attention the need to renew the operational insurance policies for the below listed units located at The Avenues. The current policies are set to expire on 23 September 2025.

 

Brands

Unit Number

Make up Forever

G090

Swarovski

G193, G194

L'Occitane en Provence

G107, G108

Michael Kors

GL011

Carolina Herrera

D0016

TUMI

D0053

Lacoste

D0055

Versace

E033

FACES

A005,A007

Swarovski

D0014

Jimmy Choo

E0058

Benefit Cosmetics

M0006

L'Occitane en Provence

M0005

Tanagra

D0059,D1059

ZIMMERMAN

E0089

 

We would appreciate it if you could forward the renewed policies to the Leasing Department at your earliest convenience.

 

Kindly initiate the process and arrange for the renewal of the following policies:

 

1.	Third Party Liability Insurance - Covering up to KD 1 million per unit 
2.	Property Insurance
3.	Workmen’s Compensation Insurance

  

 

Important Requirements:

Kindly initiate the process and arrange for the renewal of the following policies:

 

1.	Third Party Liability Insurance - Covering up to KD 1 million per unit 
2.	Property Insurance
3.	Workmen’s Compensation Insurance

  

 

Important Requirements:

 

*	The insurance policy must be issued by a company officially listed on Borsa Kuwait.
*	Prior approval for the selected insurance company must be obtained from us via email before proceeding with the issuance of any policy. 
*	The policy should explicitly mention the following details:

 

*	Brand Name
*	Unit Number
*	Location: The Avenues

  

Please forward the renewed policies to the Leasing Department as soon as possible to ensure seamless coverage.

Your prompt attention to this matter is crucial in avoiding any interruptions in coverage, and we greatly appreciate your cooperation. 

 

If you need any further information or assistance, please feel free to contact me directly.

  

 

Best Regards,

 

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/CidGCqMy4T40gLEFZfNtEF0ft?domain=mabanee.com/> 

 

Mohamad Serhan

Leasing Administrator

Leasing Department

 

Mabanee Company K.P.S.C

P.O. Box: 5132 Safat 13052 Kuwait

Al Rai, Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan Road
